title: State v. Ronnie Long – Addendum 1 – Projecting Innocence
description:
March 15, 2018 / Jon and Colin speak with guests Valena Beety and Rebecca Lavoie about episode one of the Ronnie Long series, eyewitness identifications, Shaken Baby Syndrome, and forensic odontology.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

This week's addendum is brought to you by ZipRecruiter.  
www.ZipRecruiter.com/undisclosed 

#undisclosed #udaddendum #freeronnielong
